entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Otherwise clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
